    • 方法详细资料

      • apply

        public SV apply(SV targetState,
                SV merged)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: StateTransformationFunction
        Binary function that applies a given value to the given old state to compute the new state.
        指定者:
        apply 在接口中 StateTransformationFunction<SV,SV>
        参数:
        targetState - the previous state that is the basis for the transformation.
        merged - the value that the implementation applies to the old state to obtain the new state.
        返回:
        the new state, computed by applying the given value on the given old state.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if something goes wrong in applying the transformation function.
